misc

Class Resolution

  • java.lang.Object
    • misc.Resolution

  • public class Resolution
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a miscellaneous class that is used to manage the different screen resolution of the application.

    This class manages all the screen resolution. It loads the different available screen resolution from the file *%RESOLUTIONS_FILE_NAME%*.

    Version:
    v0.1 02/05/2014
    Author:
    Eduard de Torres
